quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Wkrp and Cincinnati
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, opening, patrol. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which member of the Rat Patrol was a ladies man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hitch

questions.question: What word got Johnny fired on the sitcom WKRP in Cincinnati?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Booger

questions.question: On the TV show WKRP in Cincinnati, Carlsons wife was named Cindy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What could the Senator not explain in the opening newscast on WKRP in Cincinnati?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His nudity

questions.question: What word did all of the Rat Patrol episodes have in the title?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Raid

questions.question: What is Venus real name on the TV show WKRP in Cincinnati?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gordon Sims

questions.question: What did The Rat Patrol character Hitch always wear on his head?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: French Foreign Legion cap

questions.question: What was wrong with the house Jennifer buys on WKRP in Cincinnati?

options.text: It was in a bad neighborhood.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was haunted.

questions.question: The name of the Evangelist with a program on WKRP is Little Ed Pembrook.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Carlson from WKRP in Cincinnati loved baseball above everything else.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What unit was Moffitt in before he joined The Rat Patrol on the self-titled TV show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scots Greys

questions.question: Where was Venus Flytrap working before WKRP according to the pilot episode of the self-titled show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New Orleans

questions.question: During the filming of an episode of The Rat Patrol, a jeep overturned on Christopher George causing serious injury.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Sgt. Sam Troy was the leader of the Rat Patrol on the self-titled show. What did he always wear?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Australian bush hat

questions.question: Who played Carlsons mother in the pilot episode of WKRP?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sylvia Sydney

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Johnny Bravo and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, seagal, technique. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the Rurouni Kenshin anime series, which technique did Kenshin use to defeat Udō Jin-e?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Battōjutsu Soryūsen

questions.question: What is the color of Johnny Bravos eyes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is never revealed.

questions.question: What is the name of Johnny Bravos geeky neighbor whom he likes to call dweeb?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carl Chryniszzswics

questions.question: Who is the creator of Johnny Bravo?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Van Partible

questions.question: Which character or faction from the series Rurouni Kenshin does this theme song represent?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sagara Sanosuke

questions.question: In an episode of Johnny Bravo it is revealed that this character is a cousin of actress Farrah Fawcett.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Little Suzy

questions.question: In the Johnny Bravo episode The Perfect Gift, Johnny is trying to get some money to buy his mom this gift for Mothers Day.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A pair of bunny slippers

questions.question: Johnny Bravo is sometimes set on a date with weird creatures. Which of these has Johnny dated?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: This fictional action star, who is a Steven Seagal lookalike, is Johnny Bravos idol and favorite hero.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Squint Ringo

questions.question: An episode of Johnny Bravo is based on this very popular movie with Leonardo DiCaprio that won 11 Academy Awards.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Titanic

questions.question: What does Johnny Bravo say to his clone when meeting him in one of the episodes of the series?

options.text: Excuse me, sir, you look suspiciously pretty.
Look, mister, I dont know who you are and how you got so pretty...
Hey, you look so familiar that it almost smells funny.
Oh, mama! Now I can send me on dates and watch me pick up chicks from another angle!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Look, mister, I dont know who you are and how you got so pretty...

questions.question: Johnny Bravo sounds like this music legend.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elvis Presley

questions.question: In the anime series Rurouni Kenshin, did someone manage to dodge Kenshins attack Kuzu-ryūsen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Which character or faction from the series Rurouni Kenshin does the theme song in the sound clip represent?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sekihoutai

questions.question: According to the series Rurouni Kenshin, the first secret of the final attack Amakakeru Ryū no Hirameki is the god-like speed. What is the second secret?

options.text: Additional step with the left foot
Additional step with the right foot
To draw the sword with the left arm

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Additional step with the left foot

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Michael Scott and Office
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, steve, topless. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Steve Carells father was born with this surname.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Caroselli

questions.question: Which employee shows herself topless to Michael Scott on the TV show The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meredith

questions.question: What part did fictional character Michael Scott originally have at his mothers second wedding ceremony?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ring barer

questions.question: While he was Scranton manager, TV character Michael Scott had a second job. What was it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Telemarketer

questions.question: How did Michael Scott burn his foot on the TV show The Office?

options.text: He dropped a palette of paper on it.
He burned it on a George Foreman grill.
He closed his car door on it.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He burned it on a George Foreman grill.

questions.question: On the TV show The Office, why do the other students in Michael Scotts improv class not like him?

options.text: He can not remember his lines.
He wants to do all the talking.
He constantly uses the line I have a gun.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He constantly uses the line I have a gun.

questions.question: What role does Steve Carells real life wife, Nancy, play on The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carol,  the real estate agent

questions.question: Michaels desk on the TV show The Office always has a Worlds Best Boss award on it. How did he get it?

options.text: He got it at Pams wedding.
It was awarded to him by the Scranton Better Business Bureau.
It was given to him by David Wallace.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He bought it himself.

questions.question: How did Michael become a manager on the TV show The Office?

options.text: His cousin worked in the mail room at corporate.
His best friend, Bob Packard, recommended him.
He was one of the top salespeople in Dunder Mifflin history.
His degree from Temple was in management.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was one of the top salespeople in Dunder Mifflin history.

questions.question: Which employee does Michael Scott run into with his car in an episode of The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meredith

questions.question: Find the correct statement about fictional character Michael Scott.

options.text: Michael Scott attended Temple University in Philadelphia.
Michael Scott graduated  from Wilkes-Barre Community College
Michael Scott graduated from Scranton University.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Scott never attended college

questions.question: Which type of car does fictional character Michael Scott think shows how classy he is?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chrysler Sebring

questions.question: Which of these sentences can Michael Scott not stop saying on The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thats what she said!

questions.question: When was fictional character Michael Scott born?

options.text: March 15-the same day as Eva Longoria
October 15-the same day as  Lee Iacoca
October 28-the same day as Bill Gates
May 28-the same day as Gladys Knight

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: March 15-the same day as Eva Longoria

questions.question: Fictional character Michael Scott was a child actor.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Episode and Xena
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, college. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: When TV character Michael Scott forms his own company, who takes Michaels place at Dunder Mifflin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charles

questions.question: In the episode The Xena Scrolls, Xenas descendant (who looks remarkably like her), allows Xena to fight through her and defeat Ares.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who does Michael hook up with at Pams wedding on the TV show The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pams mother

questions.question: On the TV show The Office, when Michael wants to seal a big sale he usually brings the customer to this restaurant.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chilis

questions.question: Why did Michael Scott quit his job on the TV show The Office?

options.text: Dwight said Michael did not have the guts to do it.
He was so successful as a car salesman that he felt he would make a million with his own company.
He was insulted that David Wallace did not return his call.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was insulted that David Wallace did not return his call.

questions.question: From which college did actor Steve Carell graduate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dennison

questions.question: In the episode Fallen Angel, Xena the warrior Princess gives up her wings and travels to hell to save a fallen Gabrielle.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What happens in the Xena episode Ulysses?

options.text: Xena falls in love with Ulysses.
Xena rescues Ulysses from Poseidons followers.
Xena helps Ulysses return home to Ithaca and win back his kingdom.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of the these

questions.question: Which of the following doesnt occur in the 2-part Xena episode The Quest?

options.text: Xena is brought back to life by ambrosia.
Xena is able to communicate through Autolycus after he drank water she was using as a portal to the moral world.
Xena awakens in time to help trap Velaca - the God of Chaos, and stop her from killing Gabrielle.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Xena dies.

questions.question: Xena first appeared to viewers in the series Hercules - the Legendary Journeys, in the episode, titled The Gauntlet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was Michaels role at Phyliss wedding in the TV series The Office?

options.text: He was to check for wedding crashers.
He was in charge of watching everyones shoes.
He was to wheel her father down the aisle.
He was to deliver to ring to the best man.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was to wheel her father down the aisle.

questions.question: What happens in the episode of the Xena series titled the Furies?

options.text: Xena convinces the Furies that they werent able to drive her mad.
Gabrielle finds the answer to removing the Furies curse and frees Xena for a change.
Xena convinces the Furies that Ares was her father.
Xena attempts suicide to stop the madness.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Xena convinces the Furies that Ares was her father.

questions.question: On the TV show The Office, Michael gets back together with Jan because of this.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She had breast enlargement.

questions.question: In the first episode of the series Xena: Warrior Princess, Xena fights Draco on the scaffold erected in her mothers bar and balancing on the shoulders of patrons. This scenario was repeated in another episode.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Why did Michael Scott and Holly break up on the TV show The Office?

options.text: She was transferred to New Hampshire.
He went back to Jan because she promised him a promotion.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was transferred to New Hampshire.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Shield and Season
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, crowleys, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who uses Terry Crowley to infiltrate the strike team in the first season of The Shield?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Captain David Aceveda

questions.question: Who created the animated series The Proud Family?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bruce W. Smith

questions.question: What happens when Vic locks T-Bonz and Kern Little in the storage bin for the night in Season One of The Shield?

options.text: T-Bonz and Kern fall in love.
T-Bonz and Kern end their hostilities.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kern kills T-Bonz.

questions.question: Who was found to be responsible for the riots that ended Season One of The Shield?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Assistant Chief Benjamin Ben Gilroy

questions.question: Who makes Dutch Wagonbaugh cry in Season One of The Shield?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A serial killer

questions.question: The made for TV movie called Breaking the Surface: The Greg Louganis Story was about the life and professional career of the Olympic swimmer. Can you name the actor who portrayed Louganis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mario Lopez

questions.question: In Season One of The Shield, Julien witnesses Mackey and his men stealing evidence from a drug bust. How many kilos of cocaine did the strike team steal?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2

questions.question: Who is Pennys white and nerdy friend in the series The Proud Family?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zoey Howzer

questions.question: In Season One of The Shield, David Aceveda was given an opportunity to run for city council, but a story was written accusing him of rape. David Acedveda was really guilty of the rape.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Why does Julien go back on his statement about witnessing the strike team steal the cocaine from the Armenians in Season One of The Shield?

options.text: IAD finds Mackey innocent of the charges.
Vic walks in on him and Tomas.
Vic finds a stolen ring for him.
Aceveda convinces him that a bigger bust for Mackey is possible.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vic walks in on him and Tomas.

questions.question: In Season One of The Shield, Vic threw Rondell Robinson from a rooftop.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This made for TV movie aired on HBO in 1996 and was nominated for an Emmy. It was a triology of stories set in the same house, with different occupants over the span of 40 years.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: If These Walls Could Talk

questions.question: Who are the only two witnesses to Terry Crowleys murder in the pilot episode of The Shield?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vic and Shane

questions.question: In Season One of the  FX series, The Shield, what is unique about the bodies left by Dutch Wagonbaughs serial killer?

options.text: He ties a red ribbon to each arm.
He puts lipstick on their cheek.
He leaves the weapon inside the body.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He poses them face down.

questions.question: What does the Armenian Mobster Margos like about Danni Sofer in Season One of The Shield?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her feet
